price: Na utakapo yaona, utakuwa umeona neema na ufalme mkubwa.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيۡتَ نَعِيمٗا وَمُلۡكٗا كَبِيرًا
footnotes: Na ukitazama popote katika hiyo Pepo utaona neema kubwa, na ufalme ulio tanda.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-ayta thamma ra-ayta naʿīman wamul'kan kabīran
